thread.title: Pick for Labor Secretary Faces Tough Questions at Thursday Hearing
thread.title_full: Pick for Labor Secretary Faces Tough Questions at Thursday Hearing - WSJ

author: Kristina Peterson
title: Pick for Labor Secretary Faces Tough Questions at Thursday Hearing
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Senate approval of Andy Puzder to lead the Department of Labor will hinge in large part on his testimony in a confirmation hearing Thursday, as an unusually large number of GOP senators are reserving judgment on the nomination until they hear his explanation of several sensitive matters.
Mr. Puzder, a fast-food executive, is expected to face extensive questioning from lawmakers on the Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee on his delay in paying taxes on an undocumented worker he employed as a...
